DOC.brief_title: Epidural Volume Extension During Combined Spinal-Epidural Technique Labor Analgesia .
DOC.detailed_description: Regional analgesia ( pain relief ) labor epidural , spinal combination two . Combined spinal-epidurals ( CSE ) popular rapid pain relief high patient satisfaction . At IWK Health Centre , many anesthesiologist routinely use method pain relief . It involve injection pain relief medication cerebral spinal fluid ( CSF ) insertion epidural catheter ( slim plastic tube ) epidural space continue give pain relief medication . The epidural space locate outside CSF . In order insert epidural catheter , anesthesiologist inject 2-4 ml saline epidural space help catheter go . During CSE , injection medication CSF insert epidural catheter , normal saline inject epidural space , may increase pain relief increase level numbness . This injection saline epidural space increase pain relief numbness term epidural volume extension ( EVE ) . Thus far , study EVE do patient undergo surgery spinal anesthesia solely analgesia . The purpose study determine benefit EVE improve labor analgesia ( pain relief ) use CSE . We study 60 woman request labor pain relief . Half woman receive CSE without EVE , present standard care . The half receive CSE 10 ml saline EVE insert epidural catheter . We determine benefit EVE observe difference two group respect level numbness , amount speed pain relief intensity leg weakness . We hypothesize inject 10 ml saline EVE use CSE may improve amount speed pain relief decrease side effect leg weakness . If benefit EVE , would simple inexpensive method improve pain relief labor woman .
DOC.criteria: Nulliparous parturients request regional analgesia labour pain singleton , vertex presentation fetus 3742 week gestation active labor cervical dilation < 5 cm . American Society Anesthesia physical status class I & II ( ASA I Healthy , ASA II mild control systemic disease , e.g . control essential hypertension ) Age ≥ 18 year ( Standard within obstetrical anesthesia literature ) Englishspeaking Contraindications neuraxial analgesia ( i.e . coagulopathy , systemic infection , neuropathy ) Conditions associate abnormal spinal anatomy affect local anesthetic spread ( i.e . scoliosis , spina bifida , spinal instrumentation ) Conditions associate increase risk cesarean delivery ( i.e. , history uterine anomaly surgery , morbid obesity ( Body Mass Index ≥ 35 kg/m2 ) Clinically significant disease pregnancy pregnancyinduced hypertension preeclampsia ( define systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) > 160mmHg , diastolic blood pressure ( DBP ) > 110mmHg and/or require antihypertensive treatment associate significant proteinuria ) Severe maternal cardiac disease Known fetal anomaly /intrauterine fetal demise Patient enrollment another study involve study medication within 30 day Any physical psychiatric condition may impair ability cooperate study data collection
